values: Large 2 fam with many updates & upgrades. Porches totally rebuilt - new supports, siding, windows, deck flooring & more. 2nd unit porch was enclosed & provides extra bonus rm. All BR's are very good size. Baths are updated with new flooring. Two new refrigerators. 100amp panel per unit with wiring upgrades. Fenced yard. Roof slides added, new range 1st unit. Wood & laminate flooring. Current ROP's in place. 2nd unit uses 3rd flr for extra living space. LOW taxes. Prior day notice a must due to pet & family.
From Delaware Ave. to Second Ave. - house right between Hampton and Barrows
